entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
